member.name: T:Microsoft.Rest.Modeler.Swagger.Extensions
member.summary: Provides useful extension methods to simplify common coding tasks.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Rest.Modeler.Swagger.Extensions.StripDefinitionPath(System.String)
member.summary: Removes #/definitions/ or url#/definitions from the reference path.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Rest.Modeler.Swagger.Extensions.StripParameterPath(System.String)
member.summary: Removes #/parameters/ or url#/parameters from the reference path.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Rest.Modeler.Swagger.JsonConverters.PathLevelParameterConverter.ReadJson(Newtonsoft.Json.JsonReader,System.Type,System.Object,Newtonsoft.Json.JsonSerializer)
member.summary: To merge common parameters at the path level into the parameters at the operation level if they do not exist at the operation level

member.name: M:Microsoft.Rest.Modeler.Swagger.JsonConverters.PathLevelParameterConverter.GetParameterKey(Newtonsoft.Json.Linq.JObject)
member.summary: Returns the value of the reference or the value of the name and locattion (query, path, body)

member.summary: Swagger header object.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Rest.Modeler.Swagger.Model.CodeGenerationSettings

member.summary: Determines the format of the array if type array is used.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Rest.Modeler.Swagger.Model.SwaggerObject.Default
member.summary: Sets a default value to the parameter.

member.summary: Swagger data type.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Rest.Modeler.Swagger.Model.ExternalDoc
member.summary: Allows referencing an external resource for extended documentation.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Rest.Modeler.Swagger.Model.ExternalDoc.Url
member.summary: Url of external Swagger doc.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Rest.Modeler.Swagger.Model.ExternalDoc.Description
member.summary: Description of external Swagger doc.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Rest.Modeler.Swagger.Model.Schema
member.summary: Swagger schema object.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Rest.Modeler.Swagger.Model.Schema.Discriminator
member.summary: Adds support for polymorphism. The discriminator is the schema property serviceTypeName that is used to differentiate between other schemas that inherit this schema. The property serviceTypeName used MUST be defined at this schema and it MUST be in the required property list. When used, the value MUST be the serviceTypeName of this schema or any schema that inherits it, or it can be overridden with the x-ms-discriminator-value extension.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Rest.Modeler.Swagger.Model.Schema.Properties
member.summary: Key is a type serviceTypeName.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Rest.Modeler.Swagger.Model.Schema.Extends
member.summary: The value of this property MUST be another schema which will provide a base schema which the current schema will inherit from. The inheritance rules are such that any instance that is valid according to the current schema MUST be valid according to the referenced schema. This MAY also be an array, in which case, the instance MUST be valid for all the schemas in the array. A schema that extends another schema MAY define additional attributes, constrain existing attributes, or add other constraints.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Rest.Modeler.Swagger.Model.Schema.AllOf
member.summary: Defines the set of schemas this shema is composed of

member.name: T:Microsoft.Rest.Modeler.Swagger.Model.License
member.summary: License information for the defined API.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Rest.Modeler.Swagger.Model.License.Name
member.summary: Name of the license governing the API.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Rest.Modeler.Swagger.Model.License.Url
member.summary: URL of the licensing governing the API.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Rest.Modeler.Swagger.Model.Operation
member.summary: Describes a single API operation on a path.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Rest.Modeler.Swagger.Model.Operation.Tags
member.summary: A list of tags for API documentation control.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Rest.Modeler.Swagger.Model.Operation.OperationId
member.summary: A friendly serviceTypeName for the operation. The id MUST be unique among all operations described in the API. Tools and libraries MAY use the operation id to uniquely identify an operation.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Rest.Modeler.Swagger.Model.Operation.ExternalDocs
member.summary: Additional external documentation for this operation.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Rest.Modeler.Swagger.Model.Operation.Consumes
member.summary: A list of MIME types the operation can consume.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Rest.Modeler.Swagger.Model.Operation.Produces
member.summary: A list of MIME types the operation can produce.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Rest.Modeler.Swagger.Model.Operation.Parameters
member.summary: A list of parameters that are applicable for this operation. If a parameter is already defined at the Path Item, the new definition will override it, but can never remove it.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Rest.Modeler.Swagger.Model.Operation.Responses
member.summary: The list of possible responses as they are returned from executing this operation.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Rest.Modeler.Swagger.Model.Operation.Schemes
member.summary: The transfer protocol for the operation.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Rest.Modeler.Swagger.Model.Operation.Security
member.summary: A declaration of which security schemes are applied for this operation. The list of values describes alternative security schemes that can be used (that is, there is a logical OR between the security requirements). This definition overrides any declared top-level security. To remove a top-level security declaration, an empty array can be used.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Rest.Modeler.Swagger.Model.SwaggerParameter
member.summary: Describes a single operation parameter. https://github.com/wordnik/swagger-spec/blob/master/versions/2.0.md#parameterObject

member.name: P:Microsoft.Rest.Modeler.Swagger.Model.SwaggerParameter.Schema
member.summary: The schema defining the type used for the body parameter.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Rest.Modeler.Swagger.Model.ParameterLocation
member.summary: The location of the parameter.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Rest.Modeler.Swagger.Model.OperationResponse
member.summary: Describes a single response from an API Operation.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Rest.Modeler.Swagger.Model.SecurityDefinition
member.summary: Security Scheme Object - https://github.com/wordnik/swagger-spec/blob/master/versions/2.0.md#security-scheme-object-

member.name: P:Microsoft.Rest.Modeler.Swagger.Model.SecurityDefinition.Scopes
member.summary: Lists the available scopes for an OAuth2 security scheme. Key is scope serviceTypeName and the value is short description

member.name: T:Microsoft.Rest.Modeler.Swagger.Model.ServiceDefinition
member.summary: Class that represents Swagger 2.0 schema http://json.schemastore.org/swagger-2.0 Swagger Object - https://github.com/wordnik/swagger-spec/blob/master/versions/2.0.md#swagger-object-

member.name: P:Microsoft.Rest.Modeler.Swagger.Model.ServiceDefinition.Swagger
member.summary: Specifies the Swagger Specification version being used.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Rest.Modeler.Swagger.Model.ServiceDefinition.Info
member.summary: Provides metadata about the API. The metadata can be used by the clients if needed.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Rest.Modeler.Swagger.Model.ServiceDefinition.Host
member.summary: The host (serviceTypeName or ip) serving the API.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Rest.Modeler.Swagger.Model.ServiceDefinition.BasePath
member.summary: The base path on which the API is served, which is relative to the host.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Rest.Modeler.Swagger.Model.ServiceDefinition.Schemes
member.summary: The transfer protocol of the API.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Rest.Modeler.Swagger.Model.ServiceDefinition.Consumes
member.summary: A list of MIME types the service can consume.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Rest.Modeler.Swagger.Model.ServiceDefinition.Produces
member.summary: A list of MIME types the APIs can produce.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Rest.Modeler.Swagger.Model.ServiceDefinition.Paths
member.summary: Key is actual path and the value is serializationProperty of http operations and operation objects.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Rest.Modeler.Swagger.Model.ServiceDefinition.CustomPaths
member.summary: Key is actual path and the value is serializationProperty of http operations and operation objects.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Rest.Modeler.Swagger.Model.ServiceDefinition.Definitions
member.summary: Key is the object serviceTypeName and the value is swagger definition.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Rest.Modeler.Swagger.Model.ServiceDefinition.Parameters
member.summary: Dictionary of parameters that can be used across operations. This property does not define global parameters for all operations.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Rest.Modeler.Swagger.Model.ServiceDefinition.Responses
member.summary: Dictionary of responses that can be used across operations. The key indicates status code.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Rest.Modeler.Swagger.Model.ServiceDefinition.SecurityDefinitions
member.summary: Key is the object serviceTypeName and the value is swagger security definition.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Rest.Modeler.Swagger.Model.ServiceDefinition.Security
member.summary: A declaration of which security schemes are applied for the API as a whole. The list of values describes alternative security schemes that can be used (that is, there is a logical OR between the security requirements). Individual operations can override this definition.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Rest.Modeler.Swagger.Model.ServiceDefinition.Tags
member.summary: A list of tags used by the specification with additional metadata. The order of the tags can be used to reflect on their order by the parsing tools. Not all tags that are used by the Operation Object must be declared. The tags that are not declared may be organized randomly or based on the tools' logic. Each tag name in the list MUST be unique.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Rest.Modeler.Swagger.Model.ServiceDefinition.ExternalDocs
member.summary: Additional external documentation

member.name: P:Microsoft.Rest.Modeler.Swagger.Model.ServiceDefinition.ExternalReferences
member.summary: A list of all external references listed in the service.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Rest.Modeler.Swagger.Model.Info
member.summary: The object provides metadata about the API. The metadata can be used by the clients if needed, and can be presented in the Swagger-UI for convenience.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Rest.Modeler.Swagger.Model.Tag
member.summary: Represents a Swagger Tag

member.name: T:Microsoft.Rest.Modeler.Swagger.Model.TransferProtocolScheme
member.summary: The transfer protocol of the API.

member.summary: The builder for building a generic swagger object into parameters, service types or Json serialization types.

member.summary: The visitor method for building service types. This is called when an instance of this class is visiting a _swaggerModeler to build a service type.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Rest.Modeler.Swagger.Properties.Resources.ResponseBodyFormatNoLongerSupported1
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The old version does not support '{0}' as a response body format..

member.name: P:Microsoft.Rest.Modeler.Swagger.Properties.Resources.ResponseReferenceNotFound
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to '{0}' was not found in the responses section of the document..

member.name: P:Microsoft.Rest.Modeler.Swagger.Properties.Resources.TitleMissing
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Swagger specification is missing title in info section.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Rest.Modeler.Swagger.Properties.Resources.TooManyBodyParameters1
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Operations can not have more than one 'body' parameter. The following were found: '{0}'.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Rest.Modeler.Swagger.Properties.Resources.TypeChanged
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The new version has a different type than the previous one.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Rest.Modeler.Swagger.Properties.Resources.TypeFormatChanged
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The new version has a different format than the previous one.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Rest.Modeler.Swagger.Properties.Resources.UnknownSwaggerVersion
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Invalid swagger 2.0 specification. Missing version property. .

member.name: P:Microsoft.Rest.Modeler.Swagger.Properties.Resources.UnsupportedMimeTypeForResponseBody
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The operation '{0}' has a response body in response '{1}', but did not have a supported MIME type ('application/json' or 'application/octet-stream') in its Produces property..

member.name: P:Microsoft.Rest.Modeler.Swagger.Properties.Resources.VersionLowered2
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The new version has a lower value than the old: {0} -> {1}.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Rest.Modeler.Swagger.Properties.Resources.ZeroColonOne2
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to {0}: {1}.

member.summary: Swagger service model.

member.summary: Client model.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Rest.Modeler.Swagger.SwaggerModeler.DefaultProtocol
member.summary: Default protocol when no protocol is specified in the schema

member.summary: Builds service model from swagger file.

member.summary: Initialize the base service and populate global service properties

member.name: M:Microsoft.Rest.Modeler.Swagger.SwaggerModeler.BuildCompositeTypes
member.summary: Build composite types from definitions

member.name: M:Microsoft.Rest.Modeler.Swagger.SwaggerModeler.AncestorsHaveProperties(System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,Microsoft.Rest.Modeler.Swagger.Model.Schema},System.String)
member.summary: Recursively traverse the schema's extends to verify that it or one of it's parents has at least one property
member.returns: True if one or more properties found in this schema or in it's ancestors. False otherwise

member.summary: Builds method from swagger operation.

member.summary: Extracts method group from operation ID.

member.summary: Extracts method name from operation ID.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Rest.Modeler.Swagger.SchemaResolver
member.summary: Methods for normalizing and evaluating swagger schemas in their context in a swagger spec

member.name: M:Microsoft.Rest.Modeler.Swagger.SchemaResolver.#ctor(Microsoft.Rest.Modeler.Swagger.SwaggerModeler)
member.summary: Create a new schema resolver in the context of the given swagger spec

member.name: M:Microsoft.Rest.Modeler.Swagger.SchemaResolver.Clone
member.summary: Copy the current context - used to maintain the schema evaluation context when following multiple chains of schema references.
member.returns: A schema resolver at the same depth as the current resolver.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Rest.Modeler.Swagger.SchemaResolver.Unwrap(Microsoft.Rest.Modeler.Swagger.Model.Schema)
member.summary: Normalize a swagger schema by dereferencing schema references and evaluating schema composition

member.name: M:Microsoft.Rest.Modeler.Swagger.SchemaResolver.ExpandAllOf(Microsoft.Rest.Modeler.Swagger.Model.Schema)
member.summary: Evaluate the composition of properties for a swagger spec and save the evaluated form in the specification. This transformation is idempotent

member.name: M:Microsoft.Rest.Modeler.Swagger.SchemaResolver.SchemaTypesAreEquivalent(Microsoft.Rest.Modeler.Swagger.Model.Schema,Microsoft.Rest.Modeler.Swagger.Model.Schema)
member.summary: Determine equivalence between the types described by two schemas. Limit the comparison to exclude comparison of complexe inline schemas.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Rest.Modeler.Swagger.SchemaResolver.FindParentProperty(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Determine whether a given property is defined in the given parent schema or its ancestors. Return the property schema if it is defined, or null if not.
member.param: A reference to an ancestor schema

member.name: M:Microsoft.Rest.Modeler.Swagger.SchemaResolver.Dereference(System.String)
member.summary: Dereference a schema reference, with guards to prevent following circular reference chains
